reviews.review_text: i'm  super glad i got this case.  i have the iphone max.  i was walking out of my house with both hands full /groceries and phone. ( a normal person would put their phone away in their purse and not attempt to carry  4 bags in each hand plus a index finger holding on to their phone, but i'm not normal)  so it slipped out of my hand,  the corner of the phone  fell  perfectly on the corner of a brick landscape edging, then bounced 4 feet sideways onto pavement.  phone did not have a scratch.  i swear almost pooped my pants, cause i thought for sure it cracked... but was surprised to see it was perfectly fine...  i've had my fair share of case purchases.  i always buy the cheap $10 to $20 cases, but since i paid over $1,200 on an overpriced phone... whats another $60 on a possibly over priced case?  ....  i'm glad i bought it!
arrived on time and fits my iphone xs max perfectly. rugged but not so oversized that it feels bulky. easy to slip phone in and out of case for cleaning but is secure within the case.
i love this phone case especially while i’m doing stuff in the field or even just a work. i definitely recommend this case for anyone.
uag makes the best cases!

i ordered this case directly from uag's website ~ i've been using uag cases since my iphone 4s and this time around is no different.  this case actually really helps with grip on the xs max and in my opinion looks better than the one i had for my 7 plus.  buttons feel amazing and clicky, and the black just looks great.

honestly, this is the case i now buy for any phone i get. specifically, the uag monarch is the model. it will fit your cellphone perfectly, provide great protection and look great. it's screen protector friendly and has a great lip on the front if you put your phone face down on a surface. i just wish they would make more colors...it's either black or red, though now they have added a black carbon fiber.
works great and looks good! only wished it has more of a grip. kind of slippery.

i usually never buy products this expensive without reviews but i bit the bullet becsuse i trust uag. this case perfectly fits the max without obscuring any speakers,ports or sensors. it’s perfect protection. in particular the back dual cameras have some protection from the case without obscuring them and as usual the case is raised in the front for shock absorption. i will continue purchasing from uag for future cases
case is a semi hard rubber. feels like cheap neoprene.

i’ve had a uag case on my iphone for about 3 years. it still looks great and is solid. no cracks or breaks. decided to stay with uag on my new phone and this case is awesome. i like the all black with leather inserts. top notch!

i'm  super glad i got this case.  i have the iphone max.  i was walking out of my house with both hands full /groceries and phone. it is locked. i bought a unlocked one and received a locked one. absolutely irresponsible.
this phone said its unlocked and its not! when you call to have someone help you half the time your on hold.

the phone works perfectly, it did come unlocked, the only thing i was not satisfied with is that it didnt come with that thingy to open the sim compartment, i had to use one from other iphone. but, the phone worked perfecty and it just beautiful.
big rip off i got a imitation chinese phone with a android system on it no good
complete fake phone!
very good phone, came on perfect conditions and arrived fast. perfect for those looking for a fast, good looking and with a good camera phone.
it hasn’t worked in my country! please i just want to have the invoice to get to the store so i can get another model!!
the phone was not a unlocked
technomaster sent me a great iphone 8plus, new and crossed many thousands of international roads but got  me the product unlike that dung pile kwireless, heathens.
it says it’s fully unlocked, but mine came locked. the only carriers that work are t-mobile, sprint, at&t, and verizon

fake iphone! be aware
i loved my phone until it stopped working after two weeks will never order from this seller again
the product was brand new and authentic. however, the description says the phone is unlocked, but when i received the device, it was connected to the t-mobile carrier

ordered “like new”, unlocked 256gb iphone 8 from meow-tronics. came without the original box, as described, with an original apple charging block and cable. phone had some barely noticeable wear on the corner of the screen, but is otherwise perfect. worked fine when i transferred my sim card from iphone se on metropcs. definitely would recommend buying from this seller.
he send me used iphone 8 with generic charger  i'm order new iphone 8 with full price

i bought an iphone 8 that clearly says fully unlocked and i got a blocked phone, i am now out of the usa and i have tried to send the equipment and it has become impossible, i am not at all happy or satisfied, this purchase is a disaster, i can do?
not buy here. the seller publish item like very new. and is refurbished and with problems in my case the charging battery. 100% fail
great phone
amazing phone exactly as described and was fully unlocked
brand new product, works great. really good quality iphone.

it had multiple issues and i took it to a mobile shop that determined it was fake!  being returned for refund.  this was sold by pure mobile.
this is the worst!! i paid $960 for an iphone and i received a fake iphone, totally returning this and i want my money back!!!
not trustable.

if you can only use a phone with specific carriers, it is not unlocked.  this phone is not unlocked.  i could not put it on my verizon service. the worker at the verizon store explained to me that apple made the 7 series specific to particular carriers, which must have upset many people, because the phones were changed back to unlockable with the 8 series.

great deal and fast shipping. iphone is working perfectly in my country (uae) no connectivity problems. the only problem with iphone 7 is the hiss noise which is a general problem. apple said it will replace your phone if you experience this problem.

the shipping was on time and the product's condition was phenomenal. i'am new to apple's ecosystem, i first purchased the ipad pro 12.9 and fell in love with it so now i needed the latest and greatest. right off the bat, the sheer speed and power of this phone is insane and the camera is the best i've seen on any phone. the only thing that bothers me is the battery charge time. it's a 3 hour charge compared  to a 1 hour charge on my s7 edge.
happy with my purchase, i was weary i was going to get a fake iphone, but it is indeed real. it was delivered earlier than expected. and i'm writing this review from my new 7 plus.

i got iphone 7plus last april..but were not able to open it not until the other day.it was clearly stated that it was unlocked. but then we found out it wasnt unlocked yet..unfortunately we cant open the phone. please let us know what to do. thank you.

super recommended, elcequipo arrived perfect, and i always had all the worries i had with my purchase. each description of the product was correct and arrived in the time stipulated according to the purchase and commitment of the seller.

i bought an iphone 7 after looking at so many online and doing research.  when i received the phone everything appeared great. however after using it (not even) one day i could not hear anyone.  i went to the apple store to see if it was just dirty and they said all of the speakers were not working, they couldn't even fix it without replacing it. i definitely do not recommend this product or seller.  i am usually happy with everything from amazon but this was a waste of my money and i am very disappointed. i would like to return it for a refund.
it had multiple issues and i took it to a mobile shop that determined it was fake!  being returned for refund.  this was sold by pure mobile.
this is the worst!! i paid $960 for an iphone and i received a fake iphone, totally returning this and i want my money back!!!
not trustable.

if you can only use a phone with specific carriers, it is not unlocked.  this phone is not unlocked.  i could not put it on my verizon service. the worker at the verizon store explained to me that apple made the 7 series specific to particular carriers, which must have upset many people, because the phones were changed back to unlockable with the 8 series.

great deal and fast shipping. iphone is working perfectly in my country (uae) no connectivity problems. the only problem with iphone 7 is the hiss noise which is a general problem. apple said it will replace your phone if you experience this problem.

the shipping was on time and the product's condition was phenomenal. i'am new to apple's ecosystem, i first purchased the ipad pro 12.9 and fell in love with it so now i needed the latest and greatest. right off the bat, the sheer speed and power of this phone is insane and the camera is the best i've seen on any phone. the only thing that bothers me is the battery charge time. it's a 3 hour charge compared  to a 1 hour charge on my s7 edge.
happy with my purchase, i was weary i was going to get a fake iphone, but it is indeed real. it was delivered earlier than expected. and i'm writing this review from my new 7 plus.

i got iphone 7plus last april..but were not able to open it not until the other day.it was clearly stated that it was unlocked. but then we found out it wasnt unlocked yet..unfortunately we cant open the phone. please let us know what to do. thank you.

super recommended, elcequipo arrived perfect, and i always had all the worries i had with my purchase. each description of the product was correct and arrived in the time stipulated according to the purchase and commitment of the seller.

i bought an iphone 7 after looking at so many online and doing research.  when i received the phone everything appeared great. however after using it (not even) one day i could not hear anyone.  i went to the apple store to see if it was just dirty and they said all of the speakers were not working, they couldn't even fix it without replacing it. i definitely do not recommend this product or seller.  i am usually happy with everything from amazon but this was a waste of my money and i am very disappointed. i would like to return it for a refund.
it had multiple issues and i took it to a mobile shop that determined it was fake!  being returned for refund.  this was sold by pure mobile.
this is the worst!! i paid $960 for an iphone and i received a fake iphone, totally returning this and i want my money back!!!
not trustable.

i bought an iphone 7 after looking at so many online and doing research.  when i received the phone everything appeared great. however after using it (not even) one day i could not hear anyone.  i went to the apple store to see if it was just dirty and they said all of the speakers were not working, they couldn't even fix it without replacing it. i definitely do not recommend this product or seller.  i am usually happy with everything from amazon but this was a waste of my money and i am very disappointed. i would like to return it for a refund.

don't ever purchase from this vendor.  the iphone arrived with a non-functional power slot in it.  it didn't even come close to fitting the power tip and appeared to be missing all electronic connections.  this made the iphone useless since it couldn't be charged.  the box looked fake.  it was especially devastating since we live in a remote area where we cannot get an iphone elsewhere and had waited nearly 3 weeks for this to arrive.  to realize you've been had this way is especially cruel.

phone freezes a bit and i need to reboot but that is maybe once a week.  i am hopeful that a future update will fix this.  annoying that it doesn't read my face properly when i am wearing my glasses.  not many apps are up to the speed with the facial scan so i need to type in my password every time i check my banking statements.  the missing fingerprint button took some time getting used to but once i did, i don't even miss it.  the camera is lovely as is the speed.  i wish there were more color and size choices, but prob next year.
shipping arrive one time phone was brand new in a seal box
great phone. i love it. i need iphone for my business so im buying for show off. works great and thats what i need. thank u
number 1 problem, people can not hear me when i call them. only when i use the speaker works. unfortunately started after the 30-day return period. now i'm stuck with a phone that had zero privacy.
this was a fake phone
original iphone x, it worked with my t-mobile chip perfectly, let's see how it goes overseas...
brand new and unlocked ,all my fears where in vain.good product
we love the iphone x with the facial recognition.
apple iphone x, gsm unlocked 5.8, but it's att!
